entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:07 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:07 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:07 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 10:07 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 10:07 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
